tool_description: Analyzes environmental context from observation location and background elements to determine habitat type for bird identification filtering.

elevation.description: Elevation in meters above sea level

vegetation_type.description: Surrounding vegetation: forest, grassland, wetland, urban, coastal, desert

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Unknown vegetation type: Use one of [forest, grassland, wetland, urban, coastal, desert].
Elevation out of range: Provide elevation between -500 and 9000 meters.
usage: Input observation coordinates (latitude, longitude) and optionally elevation and vegetation_type. Returns habitat classification to filter appropriate bird species.
